H0.text: mainland greece is a body of land with water on three sides called. Isthmus

H1.text: mainland greece is a body of land with water on three sides called. Continent

H2.text: mainland greece is a body of land with water on three sides called. Island

H3.text: mainland greece is a body of land with water on three sides called. peninsula

A4.text: A peninsula is generally defined as a piece of land surrounded on most sides by water.

A5.text: A peninsula is a landform that extends from a mainland, is connected to the mainland on only one side, and is mostly surrounded by water.
